  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_112001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_112001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Perception affected by colours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung beeinflußt durch Farben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perception affectée par des couleurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Percepção afetada por cores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percezione influenzata dai colori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίληψη που επηρεάζεται από τα χρώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Opinión afectada por colores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that an object's colour in relation to its background can affect one's perception of its size. Two yellow squares of the same size but with different background colours are used as examples.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">background colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">object colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">size perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yellow squares</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Farbe einer 
Nachricht in bezug auf einen seinen Hintergrund irgendjemandes 
Vorstellung seiner Größe beeinflussen kann. Zwei gelbe 
Quadrate der gleichen Größe aber mit unterschiedlichen 
Hintergrundfarben werden als Beispiele benutzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la couleur d'un 
objet par rapport à son fond peut affecter sa perception de sa 
taille. Deux places jaunes de la même taille mais avec 
différentes couleurs de fond sont utilisées comme exemples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a cor de um objeto 
com relação a seu fundo pode afetar one's percepção de seu 
tamanho. Dois quadrados amarelos do mesmo tamanho mas com cores 
diferentes do fundo são usados como exemplos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il colore 
dell'oggetto rispetto alla relativa priorità bassa può interessare 
la sua percezione del relativo formato. Due quadrato gialli 
dello stesso formato ma con differenti colori della priorità bassa 
sono usati come esempi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το χρώμα ενός 
αντικειμένου σε σχέση με το υπόβαθρό του μπορεί να έχει 
επιπτώσεις στην αντίληψη για μέγεθός του κάποιου. Δύο 
κίτρινα τετράγωνα του ίδιου μεγέθους αλλά με τα διαφορετικά 
χρώματα υποβάθρου χρησιμοποιούνται για παραδείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el color de un 
objeto en lo referente a su fondo puede afectar su opinión de su 
talla. Dos cuadrados amarillos de la misma talla pero con 
diversos colores del fondo se utilizan como ejemplos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hintergrundfarbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbempfindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachricht Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gelbe Quadrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur de fond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception de couleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur d'objet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception de taille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">places jaunes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor do fundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção de cor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor do objeto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção do tamanho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrados amarelos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colore della priorità bassa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione di colore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colore dell'oggetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione di formato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quadrato gialli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώμα υποβάθρου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίληψη χρώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίληψη μεγέθους</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίτρινα τετράγωνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">color del fondo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">opinión de la talla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
